metadata.title: PM expresses condolences with Chinese leadership, people over loss of lives in quake

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 07 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Tuesday extended his heartfelt condolences to President Xi Jinping and the brotherly people of China for the loss of precious lives in the devastating earthquake in Xizang, China. aThe entire Pakistani nation is deeply saddened by the tragedy. Our thoughts and prayers are with the victims, their families, and all those affected. Pakistan stands in solidarity with the people of China during this difficult time,a the prime minister, in a post, on X handle said. https://x.com/cmshehbaz/status/1876181751078195581?s=46&t=SApcAZAv0zK56lMSgiF_fg
content.summary: Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif has extended his condolences to President Xi Jinping and the people of China for the loss of lives in a devastating earthquake in Xizang, China. The Pakistani nation stands in solidarity with the people of China during this difficult time.
